publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6469.1.1 Ross Finnie: The NHS—As an amendment to amendment (S3M-6469.1) in the name of Nicola Sturgeon, insert at end ", and calls on the Cabinet Secretary for Health and Wellbeing to publish immediately NHS boards’ workforce projections and to carry out robust scrutiny, including risk assessment, of the impact on the safety and quality of patient care and the provision of frontline NHS services."
